body:
Your proposal assumes the readers know what "tap format" is.

For other readers, it is: https://testanything.org/

That might have merits outside of getting more of that candy in your screenshot, but arguing for more colors is generally not the way to @robpike's heart.

You should argue any other benefits of implementing the TAP format.

Internally at Google we already implement some XML format for our testing system. Does this help us with that, for instance? Probably not, since we'll still need to implementat that XML. But it's an example of different test environments needing different interfaces, at least.
